verses.verse: And <WG2532> there came <WG2064> <WG5627> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> which <WG3588> had <WG2192> <WG5723> the seven <WG2033> vials <WG5357>, and <WG2532> talked <WG2980> <WG5656> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto me <WG3427>, Come hither <WG1204> <WG5773>; I will shew <WG1166> <WG5692> unto thee <WG4671> the judgment <WG2917> of the great <WG3173> whore <WG4204> that sitteth <WG2521> <WG5740> upon <WG1909> many <WG4183> waters <WG5204>:

And <WG2532> upon <WG1909> her <WG846> forehead <WG3359> was a name <WG3686> written <WG1125> <WG5772>, MYSTERY <WG3466>, BABYLON <WG897> THE GREAT <WG3173>, THE MOTHER <WG3384> OF HARLOTS <WG4204> AND <WG2532> ABOMINATIONS <WG946> OF THE EARTH <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto me <WG3427>, Wherefore <WG1302> didst thou marvel <WG2296> <WG5656>? I <WG1473> will tell <WG2046> <WG5692> thee <WG4671> the mystery <WG3466> of the woman <WG1135>, and <WG2532> of the beast <WG2342> that carrieth <WG941> <WG5723> her <WG846>, which <WG3588> hath <WG2192> <WG5723> the seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> and <WG2532> ten <WG1176> shofars <WG2768>.

These <WG3778> shall make war <WG4170> <WG5692> with <WG3326> the Lamb <WG721>, and <WG2532> the Lamb <WG721> shall overcome <WG3528> <WG5692> them <WG846>: for <WG3754> he is <WG2076> <WG5748> YY <WG2962> of lords <WG2962>, and <WG2532> King <WG935> of kings <WG935>: and <WG2532> they that are with <WG3326> him <WG846> are called <WG2822>, and <WG2532> chosen <WG1588>, and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103>.

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto me <WG3427>, The waters <WG5204> which <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> <WG5627>, where <WG3757> the whore <WG4204> sitteth <WG2521> <WG5736>, are <WG1526> <WG5748> peoples <WG2992>, and <WG2532> multitudes <WG3793>, and <WG2532> nations <WG1484>, and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100>.

For <WG1063> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath put <WG1325> <WG5656> in <WG1519> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> to fulfil <WG4160> <WG5658> his <WG846> will <WG1106>, and <WG2532> to agree <WG4160> <WG5658> <WG3391> <WG1106>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> <WG5629> their <WG846> kingdom <WG932> unto the beast <WG2342>, until <WG891> the words <WG4487> of 'Elohim <WG2316> shall be fulfilled <WG5055> <WG5686>.
